A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I genuinely enjoyed the movie.  There were a few plot lines to navigate\, but the depth and pacing seemed adept.  Getting more back story on Snope would have great.  I suspect the back story on Rey will be adjusted in the next movie.\n\nThe introduction of Porg will infuse merchandising interest\, but was a quick and somewhat disturbing return to the Ewoks and Jar Jar Binks.
